question: 君主国
sourceMnemonic: When you're <kanji>buddy</kanji>-buddy with the <kanji>master</kanji> of a <kanji>country</kanji>, you are rewarded splendidly. Why? Because this is a <vocabulary>monarchy</vocabulary> where being buddies with the master is a very advantageous thing!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
